GapFillInput.Title: Present Simple Passive
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct form of the verbs in brackets to complete the Present Simple Passive sentences.
GapFillInput.ContentGapFillInput:
1. Iam paid|'m paid(pay) by cheque every month.
2. He is given|'s given(give) a new car every Christmas.
3. We are taught|'re taught(teach) new phrases during the lesson.
4. Ten million newspapers are sold|'re sold(sell) every day.
5. The dish is made(make) with potatoes and onions.
6. My brother is employed|'s employed(employ) by a law firm.
7. A lot of money is saved(save) every year.
8. Our clients are taken(take) on a tour of the factory.
9. I am helped|'m helped(help) by my secretary in many ways.
10. The holiday is organised|'s organised(organise) every year by Dave.
